stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Brian is a great professor who makes it somehow fun to learn about research methods. He is a research nut which shows in his passion for teaching this class. The lectures are long as it the class meets once per week but makes them interesting as long as you participate. Submit a draft for the research paper, the feedback is vital in getting an A.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Hill was an overall great guy. He expects a lot from you. There are 3 pop quizzes on readings. Make sure you become prepared. There are 3 projects all of which aren\'t bad. He\'s a fair grader. The midterm and final are not bad either. It\'s a mixture of multiple choice, true and false, and short essays.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Took Research Methods with Prof. Hill and it was challenging but he grades fair. Exams were very hard (multiple choice). Essays and projects much easier and he graded pretty easy on them. Overall good professor.
